alert.note: Alert for City of Newport News; City of Williamsburg; Isle of Wight; James City; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:17PM EDT until June 16 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN ISLE OF WIGHT...WEST CENTRAL YORK...SOUTHERN JAMES CITY...AND NORTHEASTERN SURRY COUNTIES...THE NORTHERN CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS AND THE CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG... At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Scotland, or near Surry, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... College Of William And Mary and Kings Point around 425 PM EDT. Carver Gardens and York Terrace around 430 PM EDT. Busch Gardens and Grove around 435 PM EDT. Fort Eustis around 440 PM EDT. Newport News around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rushmere, Bacons Castle, Chippokes State Park, Water Country U.S.A., Poolesville, Governors Land, Hog Island Game Reserve, Alliance, Williamsburg Airport and U.s. Naval Weapons. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Newport News; City of Williamsburg; Isle of Wight; James City; Surry; York
